author: costin
msg: Patch from David Brownell <david-b@pacbell.net>
Added "connection close" stuff in the new HttpConnectionHandler too.

author: costin
msg: "Pluged-in" server.xml's connectors.
connector.properties in no longer needed.
Note: when you start tomcat with the new configuration,
it will start 4 adapters:
- old tomcat.server
- the new mini-http server
- Ajp11 - works with JServ's old module
- Ajp23 - a new apache module - you need to compile it
That means you can play with tomcat either as standalonr, or
from Apache. Please don't change it for a while, I want to do
more tests on multiple adapters.

author: costin
msg: Another cleanup.
There is no need to implement ServletInputStream for each adapter,
instead all fixes should go to BufferedServletInputStream.

author: costin
msg: Removed verbose messages to solve negative tests failure.

author: craigmcc
msg: Implement the new byte-array version of authenticate() in terms of the
String version for now.  This may not prove to be adequate as the security
enforcing ServiceInterceptor is created.
